/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in a soothing shade of beige, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the sky, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
